subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. and its players should commemorate two notable anniversaries: the 50th of the seminal 1961-62 season and the 35th of the rule that created free agency.
snippet: The N.B.A. and its players should commemorate two notable anniversaries: the 50th of the seminal 1961-62 season and the 35th of the rule that created free agency.
